text: We were happy to spend some time today with  @RepJoeNeguse talking about our flood recovery and resilience efforts! It is more important than ever to be prepared for, and recover from, disasters that are larger and occur more frequently due to climate change. pic.twitter.com/XeZu7O0tQb
